job_description:
About Us:

Clearbridge Mobile, an Amdocs company, is an award-winning mobile app developer that designs and develops best-in-class mobile solutions for clients including PayPal, Tim Hortons, Rogers, Bell, TD Bank, and USA Today. We are growing quickly and searching for smart, passionate people who want to join us in our mission to drive mobile transformation for the world’s most forward-thinking companies.

Responsibilities:

As a Senior Developer/Designer responsible for the backend development you will work with a diverse, tight-knit development and product team to build microservices on a mobile application and build and develop microservices layer which will integrate with several enterprise platforms.

Daily Tasks:

Design, develop, maintain and evolve backend microservices using the Spring framework to support Mobile self-serve application
Work with mobile and backend team using agile product and software development
Collaborate with multiple teams (product and tech) across the organization
Design and recommend solution to challenging problems
Prepare documentation as needed

Required Skills and Experience:

4 Years of work experience of Java 1.8+, Functional Programming (Streams)
7+ Years of work experience of Spring framework (Spring Boot, Spring MVC)
Strong experience designing Microservices architectures and APIs
Strong working knowledge of Junit & Mockito
Familiarity with Docker, Postman and SoapUI
Familiarity and comfort with Agile development practices
Experience designing, developing and documenting APIs – swagger, OPEN API, Redoc, adoc
Experience with writing automated unit and integration tests
Experience with Git for source code management
Familiarity with Amazon Web Services
Ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment

Nice To Have Skills

Functional Programming (Completable Futures)
Ability to triage and troubleshoot issues
Strong ability to prioritize work and produce deliverables on time
Excellent analytical, communication and interpersonal skills

What We Offer:

Clearbridge Mobile is focused on investing in our employees and company culture. We have worked hard to develop a collaborative and team-oriented environment that fosters opportunities for professional development. Our perks and benefits include:

Career and skill development opportunities
Exposure to a diverse range of projects and industries
Opportunities to contribute to the global technology community

Currently, all team members are working on a hybrid model.

Clearbridge Mobile welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available upon request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.

We thank all applicants for their interest; only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.
